div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1768 Mosul, in anc. Mesopotamia, before (711) 1917 Burial: c. 200 B.C. (Newell) Contents: c. 61 AR Alexander III: 2 lifetime and early post. tetradr. ( Amphipolis 1, Sicyon 1) 30 dr. ( Lampsacus 4, Aby- dus 6, Colophon 8, Magnesia 3, Miletus 6, Sardes 1, unc. 2) 3 late post. dr. ( Magnesia 1, Chios 2) Philip III: 2 dr. ( Colophon 1, Sardes 1) Lysimachus: To lifetime tetradr. ( Pella? 1, Sestus? 1, Heracleia Bith. 1, Lamp- sacus 3, Pergamum 2, Alexandreia Troas 1, Sardes 1) 2 dr. ( Ephesus) 4 post. tetradr. ( Calchedon 1, Cius 3) 8 lifetime or post. tetradr. (unc. mints) Disposition: New York 50 Record of varieties in ANS
